i wish i was taller so i could reach the cookie jar.

content.text: I'm doing great, thanks! I'm retired and enjoying spending time with my black lab.
That sounds lovely! I wish I was retired! I'm a billionaire, but I have to work so much.
I'm sure you're very busy! What do you do for work?
I don't actually work, I just invest my money. I'm actually a little afraid of being judged for my diet, because I don't eat a lot of healthy things.
Oh, that's interesting. I'm not sure what you're afraid of being judged for, but I'm sure you're fine!
Thanks! I guess I'm just worried that people will think I'm not healthy.
Well, I'm sure you're healthy enough! You look great!
Thanks! That's nice of you to say!
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my two dogs, they're my best companions and make me laugh every day!
That sounds wonderful! I love dogs too!
